## Before the Workshop

- Answer [these questions](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ntePDIJVWe6Y8JHjKMcFbmYNKJNIN3V-APeY3Dp1qTg/edit?usp=sharing) (on paper) and bring to the workshop.


## Thursday June 20, 2019 

-  8:15 am -  9:00 am: Registration/Breakfast 
-  9:00 am -  9:15 am: [Welcome (and welcome back to returnees)](/blog/presentation-welcome/) & housekeeping announcements (Danny Kaplan)
-  9:15 am -  9:30 am: [Icebreaker](/img/Icebreaker.pdf): Teaching Statistics (Ambika Silva)
-  9:30 am -  9:50 am: [GAISE and ASA/AMATYC guidelines to teaching statistics](/blog/presentation-GAISE-ASA/) (Nick Horton)
-  9:50 am - 10:20 am: Tidy data 
                     [[slides](/slides/slides-tidy-data.html)] 
                     [[notes](/blog/presentation-tidy-data/)]
                     (Danny Kaplan)

- 10:20 am - 10:30 am: Break

- 10:30 am - 11:00 am: Orientation to the StatPREP website, Little Apps, and [MAA Connect](/blog/community-MAA-connect/) (Kate Kozak)
- 11:00 am - 11:15 am: Share out from last year's participants (Helen Burn)
- 11:15 am - 12:00 pm: [Introduction to RStudio cloud](/blog/technology/) (Nick Horton and Kelly McConville)
        * [link to RStudio project](https://rstudio.cloud/spaces/18369/join?access_code=ZHkYZ0lHtkancAhUVB5l7YqhErMAX%2BykqI9%2Bj7y6)

- 12:00 pm -  1:00 pm: Lunch/Discussion of curricular issues

-  1:00 pm -  2:00 pm: Using StatPREP Little Apps in the Classroom Activity #1: [Center and spread](/blog/instructions-center-spread/) (Joe Roith)
-  2:00 pm -  2:50 pm: Using StatPREP Little Apps in the Classroom Activity #2: [Introduction to the Normal Distribution](/blog/instructions-normal-distribution/) (Thomas Kinzeler)
-  2:50 pm -  3:00 pm: Break
-  3:00 pm -  3:30 pm: Bringing data into RStudio (Nick Horton and Kelly McConville)
-  3:30 pm -  4:00 pm: Share Out / Adjourn for the day (Nick Horton and Kate Kozak)

## Friday June 21, 2019

-  8:15 am -  9:00 am: Breakfast 

-  9:00 am -  9:15 am: [Getting to know Tutorials](/blog/tutorials/) (Danny Kaplan)
-  9:15 am -  9:45 am: [Searching for Data? How to find good sources](/blog/data-curated-data-sources/). (Danny Kaplan)
-  9:45 am - 10:05 am: Using StatPREP Little Apps in the Classroom Activity #3: [Confidence intervals](/blog/instructions-confidence-intervals/) (Kate Kozak and Ambika Silva)
- 10:05 am - 10:25 am: Using StatPREP Little Apps in the Classroom Activity #4: [Two-sample t-test](/blog/instructions-two-sample-t-test/) (Kate Kozak and Ambika Silva) & participant check-in


- 10:25 am - 10:35 am: Break

- 10:35 am - 11:00 am: Using StatPREP Little Apps in the Classroom Activity #5: [Linear Regression](/blog/instructions-linear-regression/) (Helen Burn)
- 11:00 am - 11:30 am: [Bootstrapping Little App](/blog/LA-bootstrap/) (Kelly McConville)
- 11:30 am - 12:00 pm:  [Assessment brainstorm](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xO2DDpLulKdcIlTbZK-T8D92RSFWDG49AbT6y3ZbM5I/edit?usp=sharing)
- 12:00 pm - 12:45 pm: Lunch / Discussion: coordination among institutions
- 12:45 pm -  1:30 pm: **Choose one breakout to attend:**
    a. New to R? Learn the basics. (Kelly McConville and Kate Kozak)
    b. Intermediate R. (Danny Kaplan and Nick Horton)
    c. Using Little Apps in your class ~~today~~ tomorrow! (Helen Burn)
-  1:30 pm -  1:45 pm: Break

-  1:45 pm -  2:15 pm: [It's all regression!](/blog/presentation-its-all-regression/) (Danny Kaplan)
-  2:15 pm -  3:00 pm: Small-group discussion followed by Q & A panel discussion
-  3:00 pm: Adjourn
